page.title: 07TREE SURVEY _ MILDENHALL
page.content: The aim of this survey was to identify as many species of trees as possible in the village of Mildenhall. Most of the trees seemed to be quite old.In particular in the churchyard there were many old tall trees,and Church Lane is also bordered by many tall trees,mainly{ash. In peoples'gardens,there were a number of{willow}trees. Also,many people had{apple}trees or{pear}trees in their back gardens. In the area around Church Lane a lot of{ash}trees and{conifers}were identified,as well as a few{beech trees. A number of{hawthorn}bushes are used to divide,fields and gardens.
